dashboard.steps.stepsToGetStarted.button: Add as a content folder to Front Matter

dashboard.steps.stepsToGetStarted.conten: Add one of the folders we found in your project as a content folder. Once a folder is set, Front Matter can be used to list all contents and allow you to create content.
You can also perform this action by right-clicking on the folder in the explorer view, and selecting register folder
